@dangergirl101 Plus I don't think Sausage and Christian would want to be in the same competition.
@dangergirl101 He came back for the special 1 hour episode and 2 redemptions. But he and Sausage run the shop so hard to be away for filming.
@dangergirl101 I have a feeling that married couple won't be married after this season. Just basing it on editing. Sausage and Joey would have been cool
@dangergirl101 I would have been interested if one of the twins from last season return with his brother who got eliminated before they were put on teams.
@dangergirl101 Although I wouldn't mind a couple's version of Ink Master. So maybe Cleen and Megan and the bickering couple from this season
@dangergirl101 I wasn't a fan of his. I liked Tommy though. Hopefully no more Cleen after this.
@dangergirl101 Of course. Not a fan of returning players come every week when others are there from day 1.
@dangergirl101 And they're going to have a season 7. But Piper was in prison for only 2 years. So the last few seasons have lasted a few days in storyline
@dangergirl101 I feel the producers painted themselves in a corner. Season 1 they went to almost a year. Like huge time lapse. The show got successful
